basic_info.name: SLBSRSV College Admission
description: For admission to BA, MA, and M.Phil an Common University Entrance Test (CUET) followed by Interview is the criteria for the admissions.

For and Ph.D, B.Ed., and M.Ed. Courses, a candidate must have secured 55% marks in Masters’ degree from a recognized University. Admissions are made on the basis of the All India Combined Entrance Test followed by Personal Interview.

basic_info.name: SLBSRSV Placements
description: SLBSRSV has a placement cell which guides its students to enhance their skills and be employable in their respective fields. A Career Counselling Centre was established under the 11th five-year plan. Different career based activities are organized from time to time to impart necessary skills to the students.

description: SLBSRSV extends scholarships to its meritorious and needy students to encourage them and promote Sanskrit in the present times. In case of lack of scholarships, 2nd or 3rd Year Students may be given the scholarship who couldn’t earn it in 1st Year.

description: According to reviews by Students, SLBSRSV has faculties who are knowledgeable and maintain a friendly relation with the students. faqs.question: Is SLBSRSV a private Institution?
faqs.answer: Ans.No. VSC is a Central Sanskrit University recognized by UGC.

faqs.question: Is SLBSRSV the same as ‘Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri National Sanskrit University’?
faqs.answer: Ans.‘Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri National Sanskrit University’ is the new name for SLBSRSV.

faqs.question: How are the admissions done in SLBSRSV?
faqs.answer: Ans.SLBSRSV takes admissions through entrance-test. In courses like B.Ed. and Ph.D, a test followed by Interview is the procedure for admission.

faqs.question: What are the facilities provided by SLBSRSV?
faqs.answer: Ans.SLBSRSV provides facilities like Library, Hostels, Guest House, Vedhshala, Yajnashala, etc.

faqs.question: What is the scenario of ragging in SLBSRSV?
faqs.answer: Ans.SLBSRSV has a ragging-free campus with strict rules and regulations against ragging. It also has an anti-ragging cell to look into these matters.

Section.name: About Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri National Sanskrit University
Section.description:
SLBSRSV, now known as “Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri National Sanskrit University”, has been accredited “deemed University” status by UGC in the year 1987. It was established in 1962 in New Delhi, and is a Central Sanskrit University.
SLBSRSV has consistently achieved high performance which was lauded by the 10th five-year plan review Committee. SLBSRSV has a vision to interpret the Shastric traditions in the modern context, preserving them.
It offers 23 courses across 2 streams. It provides UG and PG courses, along with M.Phil. and Ph.D. Courses. It also offers part-time Certificate and Diploma Courses to selected candidates. It also provides opportunities for higher studies in auxiliary components of Sanskrit like Jyotish, and Vastu Shastra.
The courses offered by SLBSRSV are BA, MA, B.Ed, M.Ed, M.Phil, and PhD along with diploma and certification courses.
Admission to BA, MA, and M.Phil provided based on the entrance test followed by Interview is the criteria for the admissions. For and Ph.D, B.Ed., and M.Ed. Courses, admissions are made on the basis of Common University Entrance Test (CUET) followed by Personal Interview.
SLBSRSV is one of the most reputed Sanskrit Universities that has consistently performed in its respective field. It was also lauded by the 10th five-year plan review committee.
